title: Justbillywitt
author: Justbillywitt
content: E get something wey dey bother me like this for some time and this this thing don too much and I don decide to bring am out make other country people put their mouth for this matter. Why be say we Naija people believe say anything wey we dey suffer na spiritual attack, without seeking for scientific explanations. Even the evidence dey show say the thing get scientific solution most Naija people go still believe say na spiritual problem. We don give room to this spiritual houses to exploit and milk us dry and many of them they lavida from our ignorance. I get one friend wey been no well, the guy start to dey misbehave and e dey show say na mental condition but the parents and other close relatives come dey think say na juju dey hold the boy. The guy been dey act normal but suddenly him come dey act like say him dey run mad, if you and am dey talk him go dey talk off point. You go tell am something and him go relpy you with another thing come dey laugh join. The people come they go prayer houses and herbalists them place dem spend money on goats and fowls for sacrifices. After many months the boy situation come dey worst more than before. I been don suggest for them make them carry the boy go Psychiatrist hospital, but them no agree them say na juju wey dey family house dey do the boy. After some time when dem don do everything and nothing happen na there them come approach me say that hospital wey I been talk say make we go there. Na so I carry them go the hospital for rumigbo inside Port Harcourt. After the doctor attend to the boy and test was conducted, dem come discover say na one condition wey dem dey call dementia dey worry the boy. Na so them recommend drugs and injections wey the boy go dey take every month. Today the boy don dey normal and don get him life back. The thing come be say him dey on drugs monthly and the doctor say thank God say we come the time wey we do, say if to say we waisted more time say the boy for don mad finish. Something wey I want make we know be say no be everything wey dey do us be spiritual. Most people wey dey mad for street today no smoking or durgs make them mad and no be even people wey be their enemy make them mad. Some na cases wey be like this my friend own but people over look am say na drugs, smoke, or spiritual attack. To know more about this condition you can read more here. https://celebrateseniorliving.org/2023/04/19/different-types-of-dementia/ Knowledge is power. Before we conclude say something na spiritual make we make sure we don try and there is no medical or scientific explanation to the problem. Many people they they suffer today because people around they are ignorant. I believe we can still do more to save people that have this similar cases from running mad totally and other people passing through other conditions by always suggesting science first before spirituality.

comments.body: This matter tie wrapper my brother. The thing be say, religion don do a lot of damage in our psyche here. We tend to be more religious than even God that is why we put everything intop spirituality. See as the country keep face, God give us everything as a country yet we allow the worst people to rule us while we pray to God to come down from heaven and help us. It is a thing of religious colonialism. No blame our parents, their own parents also pass the same thing to them... na chain reaction. Wetin you dey even expect from a people wey think say the poorer you are, the more righteous you become just because Bible talk say "it is easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a niddle than for a rich man to enter into the Kingdom of God"The one wey dey pain me be say no how you go to any spiritual house that they will not tell you there is a problem. It must be either your forefathers, your village people, your mama, uncles etc, there must be somebody after you. They will see all these problems yet they cannot offer solution. The earlier we focus on God a lone and forget about all these plenty fakes around, the better for us.
